title: Nature's Snare
content:
cation: Can be found at Underground Passage inside a locked chest, guarded by a fire trap. You will need the Charred Key to avoid an explosion. You can loot this key from a dead body in X:-453 Y:-185. To reach this dead body you have to jump.

Nature's Snare Notes & Tips

Rarity: Uncommon Value: 400 Gp. Weight: 1.8 Kg. ID: ??

Weapons Adamantine Longsword ♦ Adamantine Mace ♦ Adamantine Scimitar ♦ Air Myrmidon Flail ♦ Allandra's Whelm ♦ Ambusher ♦ Arcane Absorption Dagger ♦ Arduos Flame Blade ♦ A
